news.title: 梅琳达·盖茨称前夫涉爱泼斯坦案勾起痛苦回忆
news.title0: 'Painful times in my marriage' - Melinda French Gates reacts to ex-husband in Epstein files
news.content: 梅琳达·盖茨表示，前夫比尔·盖茨出现在爱泼斯坦新文件中，勾起了她婚姻中的痛苦回忆。
news.content0: Billionaire philanthropist Melinda French Gates has said her ex-husband, Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, being named in new files relating to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein dredged up "painful times in my marriage".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 安德鲁王子因爱泼斯坦文件风波搬离皇家住所
news.title0: Andrew moves out of Royal Lodge home after latest Epstein files
news.content: 安德鲁王子已从温莎的皇家住所搬至诺福克的桑德灵厄姆庄园，爱泼斯坦文件风波加速了他的搬迁。
news.content0: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor has moved out of his home in Windsor to the Sandringham Estate in Norfolk.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国男子讲述在加勒比海遭牛鲨袭击经历
news.title0: 'I've never hit anything so hard': What it's like to be attacked by a shark
news.content: 一名英国退休男子在特立尼达和多巴哥度假时遭牛鲨袭击，腿部、手臂和腹部严重受伤，经多次手术后幸存。
news.content0: It was the last hour of the last day of Peter Smith's holiday in Tobago when he decided to take a dip in the sea.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 卡扎菲之子赛义夫据报在利比亚遭枪击身亡
news.title0: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of ex-Libyan leader, reportedly shot dead
news.content: 利比亚前领导人卡扎菲之子赛义夫·伊斯兰·卡扎菲据报在津坦市的家中遭武装人员袭击身亡，终年53岁。
news.content0: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of Libya's former leader Col Muammar Gaddafi, has reportedly been shot dead.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 萨拉·弗格森与爱泼斯坦邮件显露出绝望求助
news.title0: Sarah Ferguson emails to Epstein show increasing desperation
news.content: 新披露的邮件显示，约克公爵夫人萨拉·弗格森曾向爱泼斯坦寻求经济和工作支持，言辞间充满绝望。
news.content0: Sarah Ferguson's image was once about her good-humoured ability to bounce back from misfortunes and embarrassment, but the latest Epstein emails appear to cast her in a different light.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 印度跨宗教情侣遭“荣誉谋杀”震惊村庄
news.title0: 'Never imagined this': Indian village grapples with interfaith couple's killing
news.content: 印度北方邦一对跨宗教情侣遭女方三名兄弟杀害并埋尸，警方以“荣誉谋杀”案逮捕嫌疑人，事件震惊当地社区。
news.content0: The murder of an interfaith couple and the arrest of the woman's brothers by the police for the alleged crime has shocked a small village in India's northern Uttar Pradesh state where residents have lived in harmony for years.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美司法部因泄露受害者信息撤下数千份爱泼斯坦文件
news.title0: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
news.content: 美国司法部因文件编辑疏漏泄露受害者身份，已将数千份爱泼斯坦案相关文件从其网站撤下进行重新编辑。
news.content0: The US Department of Justice (DOJ) has removed thousands ofdocuments related to Jeffrey Epstein from its website after victims said their identities had been compromised.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国首相谴责俄军严寒中袭击乌克兰能源设施
news.title0: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
news.content: 英国首相斯塔默谴责俄罗斯在严寒中袭击乌克兰能源设施的行为“特别卑劣”，称其为“野蛮”行径。
news.content0: Russia's attacks on Ukraine's energy sector on Monday night - as temperatures dropped to -20C (-4F) - were "barbaric" and "particularly depraved", UK Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer has said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计引争议
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，耗资23亿澳元，灵感来自当地民居，但因选址在遗产公园引发争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN
